strapiPost.title: Oktober's First Friday This Week in Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
Oktoberfest is coming to Northwest Arkansas as the theme of this month's First Friday in Bentonville.

  • Origins: The official Oktoberfest occurs annually in Munich, Germany, for the first couple weeks of October and has been a tradition for over 200 years, beginning as a celebration of a royal wedding.
  • Who wore it best? The event will include live music, German and fall foods, yoga, and, of course, a beer garden. While not mandatory, dirndls and lederhosen are encouraged - the best attire will be rewarded.

Get all the details about it here.
